41907.name: Government expenditure on primary education as % of GDP (%)
41907.description: Total general (local, regional and central) government expenditure on primary education (current, capital, and transfers), expressed as a percentage of GDP. It includes expenditure funded by transfers from international sources to government. Divide total government expenditure for a given level of education (ex. primary, secondary, or all levels combined) by the GDP, and multiply by 100. For more information, consult the UNESCO Institute of Statistics website: http://www.uis.unesco.org/Education/
41907.s_name: World Bank EdStats: Government expenditure on primary education as % of GDP (%)
